segments.text: I can’t help but feel a pang of nostalgia as I watch the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on the plate is unwavering, yet everything else is unraveling around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is practically shouting for attention, but she hears nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s risky ascent to the cookie jar is thrilling; my heart races just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something innocent about their mischief, a shared secret that binds them together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the danger is so palpable; that stool could go over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks peaceful, but inside, it feels like a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watching him with her palm outstretched is a sight that makes me smile, despite the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s amazing how quickly a simple kitchen scene can flip from tranquility to chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope they don’t get hurt; the thought makes me feel nauseous.
segments.speaker: PAR
